channel.title: Clue scrolls
channel.description:
I got this after completing a puzzle box that took me 10mins. (I am bad at them) Such a waste of time :P
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6hFRL.jpg[/img]

item.title: Clue scrolls
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:20, topic:454743”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=557605.msg4085914#msg4085914 date=1345843944]

[quote author=rip4d link=topic=557605.msg4085730#msg4085730 date=1345818552]
I don’t even care if I get bad rewards from clues, I just find them fun I LOVE puzzle boxes and celtic knots. I really wish elite clues were more common.
[/quote]Love celtic knots, puzzle boxes are boring.
[/quote]I’d do a puzzle box any day over a celtic knot. Puzzle boxes can be done in 2-5 minutes depending on how good you are[/quote]Celtic knots can be done in 1-3 minutes

item.title: Clue scrolls
item.dc:creator: @Decimus Decimus
item.description:
@Decimus wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:7, topic:454743”]7/7/12 Clue 1 (hard): Zamorak Body, Rune platebody(h4), rune hatchet, 33 nature runes - 87,511
7/7/12 Clue 2 (medium): 24 Adamant bolts, Adamant Platebody, 45 saradomin arrows - 59,145
7/8/12 Clue 3 (hard): Rune Dagger, Black D’hide Chaps, Guthix Coif, Guthix chaps, Black D’hide Body, Rune Pickaxe - 44,494
7/17/12 Clue 4 (hard): 2 Black D’hide Bodies, 38 Law runes, 15 Biscuits - 24,980
7/17/12 Clue 5 (hard): 3 Meercat pouches, Rune Pickaxe, Rune Dagger, 38 Law Runes - 23,633
7/18/12 Clue 6 (hard): Magic Shortbow, 13 Lobsters, 24 Mahogany planks, 4 Bandit Camp Teleport - 62,565
7/18/12 Clue 7 (hard): Black D’hide Chaps, Rune Hatchet, Willow composite bow, Rune longsword, 16 Mahogany Planks, 49 Law runes - 62,953
7/18/12 Clue 8 (hard): Armadyl page 2, 13 sharks, 2 Black D’hide Bodies, Rune longsword - 42,614
7/18/12 Clue 9 (hard): 15 Lobsters, 8 Miscellania Teleports - 14,299
7/24/12 Clue 10 (hard): Rune hatchet, Rune Platebody, Rune pickaxe, Blue Dragonhide body(t), 28 Mahogany Planks - 128,350
7/24/12 Clue 11 (hard): 4,837 gp, 58 mahogany planks, Rune Platebody, 14 Lobsters, 6 Bandit camp teleports - 183,935
7/24/12 Clue 12 (hard): Rune battleaxe, 23 mahogany planks, Rune crossbow, Black d’hide chaps, 5 phoenix lair teleports - 85,011
7/25/12 Clue 13 (hard): Yew Composite Bow, 24 Blood Runes, Rune Hatchet, Rune Dagger - 17,888
7/26/12 Clue 14 (hard): 29 Blood Runes, 46 Nature Runes, Rune Full helm, 59 Saradomin arrows - 91,861
7/26/12 Clue 15 (hard): 20 Runite bolts, 84 Law Runes, 15 biscuits - 12,320

That’s my log of clues. I haven’t done a clue in a while. :P[/quote]
Wow thats a lot. I dont mind doing them its just im slow at puzzle boxes

Read full topic

Go to warriors guild
Get tokens
Kill shit.

item.description:

Dan, GET MORE TELES. You don’t have an ectophial, explorer’s ring, port sarim tele, etc. GET THEM. CLUES BECOME A LOT EASIER AND FASTER. More clues = more profit
